function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Hesitation that the execution of the European Green Deal (EGD) may fail or not meet the scale of the climate challenge","Impact":"Failure to achieve the 2030 target for greenhouse gas emissions reduction in Europe, falling short of climate science recommendations","Mitigation":"Redesigning European financial instruments to enable innovative and socially directed investment and growth","Technologies":"Financial technology and policy redesign","People":"Supporters of the EGD","Owner":"European Commission and financial institutions"},{"Description":"Political challenges to the implementation of the EGD, including opt-outs by member states and tight timelines for introducing the Climate Law","Impact":"Slow progress and potential failure to implement the EGD and meet climate targets","Mitigation":"Engaging in public debate and negotiation to address opt-outs and tight timelines, prioritizing the 2030 target","Technologies":"Policy negotiation and stakeholder engagement","People":"European Commission, Member States, and MEPs","Owner":"European Commission and political institutions"},{"Description":"Polarized opinion on the EGD even before the onset of the coronavirus pandemic","Impact":"Reduced public support and potential disruption to implementation efforts","Mitigation":"Education and communication to address polarized opinions, proactive engagement with stakeholders","Technologies":"Communication and engagement platforms","People":"General public and stakeholders","Owner":"European Commission and communication agencies"}]}
